attributes.action: Prohibit the sale of Wembley Stadium the homeland of English Football
attributes.background: The sale of Wembley Stadium should be prohibited in law. There are a multitude of reasons not just the taxpayers previous financial support why the sale of such a iconic site should be proactively prevented. For example, the long outstanding near 100 year history including the 1966 world cup.

rejection.details:
Any decision about selling Wembley Stadium is the responsibility of the Football Association, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could contact the FA directly about this issue:
http://www.thefa.com/about-football-association/contact-us

You could start a new petition to ask the UK Government to urge the FA not to sell Wembley Stadium.
